Variable.Name: FailedToPasteInCompLOC
Variable.Value: An invalid company location was given. The Vendor Part and Company Location must belong to the same Vendor.

Variable.Name: FailedToCreateItem
Variable.Value: Item ~ is not allowed as an attachment of an Item/Revision

Variable.Name: FailedToCreateFolder
Variable.Value: Relating an object of type "Folder" to an object of type "Item Revision" is not allowed, because the "Specifications" relation is not supported between these two objects.
